title: DownTown Standard Doble
description: A comfortable and cozy option, ideal for couples or solo travelers looking to relax in a modern and well-located environment in the heart of the city.

title: DownTown Standard Triple
description: Perfect for small groups or families, this room combines functionality and comfort, with enough space for everyone.

title: DownTown Superior
description: Designed for those seeking an extra level of comfort, this room offers an elegant, modern, and spacious atmosphere.

title: Comfort Family Room
description: Ideal for families, this room offers comfort and space, with a layout designed for the rest of all group members.

title: Tropical Family Room with a swimming pool view
description: With a view of the pool and located in the heart of the city, this room is ideal for families or groups who value comfort.
